riskgame.model.BasicClass

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • riskgame.model.BasicClass.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    This class includes attributes a player need and required methods Observer property of this class is updating changes triggered by countries As a observable object, player is observed by CardExchangeViewObserver for cards' changes
    Since:
    build1
    Author:
    Zhanfan Zhou, Karamveer, Wei Wang

      • alloutAttackSimulate

        public java.lang.String alloutAttackSimulate(Country attackingCountry,
                                             Country defendingCountry,
                                             int attackArmyNbr,
                                             int defendArmyNbr,
                                             boolean UIOption)
        Util method for recursive attacks allout attack mode, which results in either attacker wins or defender wins.
        Parameters:
        attackingCountry - attacking country
        defendingCountry - defending country
        attackArmyNbr - army number of attacking country
        defendArmyNbr - army number of defending country
        Returns:
        battle info

      • oneAttackSimulate

        public java.lang.StringBuilder oneAttackSimulate(Country attackingCountry,
                                                 Country defendingCountry,
                                                 int attackArmyNbr,
                                                 int defendArmyNbr)
        this functions calculates that how many armies defender or attacker have after the attack
        Parameters:
        attackingCountry - attacking country
        defendingCountry - defending country
        attackArmyNbr - army number of attacking country
        defendArmyNbr - army number of defending country
        Returns:
        battle info

      • executeAttack

        public void executeAttack()

      • executeAttack

        public java.lang.String executeAttack(Country attackingCountry,
                                      Country defendingCountry,
                                      int attackArmyNbr,
                                      int defendArmyNbr,
                                      boolean isAllout)
        Processing attack with following the game rules:

        if attacker army number is equal or greater than three, attacker will roll three dices if defender army number is equal or greater than two, defender will roll two dices if army number is less than above requirements, it will roll the dices as many times as the remaining army number compare the best dice with both sides then compare the second best dicewdd deduct army number from the losing side

        Parameters:
        attackingCountry - attacking country
        defendingCountry - defending country
        attackArmyNbr - army number of attacking country
        defendArmyNbr - army number of defending country
        Returns:
        battle info

      • executeReinforcement

        public void executeReinforcement(PhaseViewObservable observable)

      • executeReinforcement

        public void executeReinforcement(Country country,
                                 int army)
        Human method. Three steps: 1. Add army to country. 2. Add army to player. 3. Subtract undeployed army from player.
        Parameters:
        country - deploying country
        army - army count

      • removeObservableCards

        public void removeObservableCards(java.lang.Iterable<Card> cards)
        public method for setting observable objects value. Removing a set of cards from player

        Do not require setChanged because it will not notify any observer Observer will only update changes when rendering view

        Parameters:
        cards - iterable cards, e.g. ObservableList

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        1. update former owner's owned country name list and army nbr. 2. delete former owner(observer) from country(observable). 3. update new owner's owned country name list and army nbr. 4. new owner get a card. 5. add new owner(observer) to country(observable). army nbr can also update later in ReinforceViewController since it does not need display until reinforcement phase
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - Country(Observable)
        arg - update message
